title: Không biết bao giờ browser hỗ trợ dịch từ ngôn ngữ khác sang tiếng Việt nhỉ?
content: Tôi muốn hỏi rằng Mozilla có kế hoạch nào để tích hợp sẵn tính năng dịch trang web từ các ngôn ngữ khác sang tiếng Việt trong trình duyệt Firefox hay không? Đây là một tính năng rất cần thiết, đặc biệt là đối với tôi khi thường xuyên đọc tài liệu nước ngoài. Việc gặp phải những từ khó khiến quá trình đọc hiểu trở nên chậm hơn, vì vậy nếu có sẵn tính năng dịch từ ngôn ngữ khác sang tiếng Việt thì sẽ vô cùng tiện lợi và hữu ích. Tôi nhận thấy hiện nay trình duyệt đã hỗ trợ dịch từ tiếng Việt sang tiếng Anh, nhưng chiều ngược lại thì chưa có. Rất mong cộng đồng hoặc đội ngũ phát triển có thể chia sẻ thêm thông tin về việc liệu tính năng này có nằm trong kế hoạch phát triển tương lai hay không, và nếu có thì dự kiến khi nào sẽ ra mắt. Xin chân thành cảm ơn!
creator: thuantran.123

title: Gmail treating emails as spam
content: Hi I am the postmaster for my Probus club. https://www.probusneutralbay.org/ Gmail is treating my generic club emails as spam: Probusnb Post Master<probusnbpostmaster@gmail.com> The suggested fixes - SPF / DKIM / DMARC seem to be overkill and a bit beyond my tech skills. Is there a simpler way to stop Gmail treating my emails as spam? I can send bulk emails using my personal Gmail address. This may have nothing to do with Mozilla but I thought I would ask. Many thanks Paul Shea +61 434 518 498
creator: paulxshea

title: bug 1990978
content: I reported an issue with Firefox 143.0.2 where History would not stay deleted. Same problem as reported by Bojan Nesic 5days ago. It looks like the bug is fixed/closed. (Sorry- this is first time I've reported a bug). I updated to 143.0.3 but bug remains. Is there another update? Thanks
creator: dan.sibo7522

title: FF OneTab on Widnows 10 Pro
content:
When using "about:support" on Firefox I'm not seeing my "profile path". Are there instructions on this method to make sure I don't loose all of my OneTab-tabs, or should I use another method? A FF comment: If you have a backup of this profile folder than you can restore your data...where do I find this folder?

You also suggest using a backup program--not sure what this means. How do I run backup software on my computer to restore my Firefox profile folder (a file path) ? I do have an external hard drive continuously backing up my files, however I don't know if this will back up browser settings/data whether it does or not- do I need to search for doing this from the manufacturer or from you.

Another suggestion from your help articles: If you don't use our "backup/sync feature, then the only way to recover the deleted data is if (a repeat of the above suggestion )you run backup software on your computer that can restore your Firefox profile folder.

I'm confused on what the backup/sync feature is referring to, unless you're talking (install FF on my Chromebook" so that it puts all my settings and data onto that device? ...sorry.

My problem is Microsoft is giving ppl until Oct 13th (2 weeks away) to upgrade to windows 11. I'm afraid I'll lose all of the FF windows and tabs that I moved into OneTab. This was hundreds of hours of work not to mention the amount of money I've paid to access these websites for research.

Any response would be greatly appreciated...I saw a comment that FF is working on a solution for this but I may not get it until it's to late.

~~Sharp63 (LOL I'm now 78)

OMG..I just saw and update available for FF. Based on what I just read, it's possible I'll lose all of the data in OneTab, What should I do...thinking! First thing is I'll look to see what the update is about, then decide.
creator: sharp63
